alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 2:23AM EST until December 24 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 19 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 possible. * WHERE...Gilchrist County. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until 11 AM EST this morning. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
